name: The royal vest of Lucifer
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom phenomenally.
It has great armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration unbelievably much.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of shielding'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'greater vulnerability'.
It affects the skill mastery of shielding.
It affects the skill greater vulnerability.
